snippet: The trains crashed after a derailment near Fairfield on Friday evening, injuring 60 people, five of them critically, and snarling transit corridors in the Northeast.
abstract: Two Metro-North Railroad trains collide after a derailment near Fairfield, Conn, injuring 60 people, 5 of them critically; passengers describe chaotic scene after the crash.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and ROBERT DAVEY

lead_paragraph: The trains crashed after a derailment near Fairfield on Friday evening, injuring 60 people, five of them critically, and snarling transit corridors in the Northeast.

headline.seo: Metro-North Trains Collide in Connecticut; Dozens of Injuries Are Reported
headline.main: Metro-North Trains Collide in Connecticut; Dozens of Injuries Are Reported
headline.print_headline: Metro-North Trains Collide in Connecticut; Dozens of Injuries Are Reported
